title: Overall [0–4]
stimulusHtml:
Score Scale 0–4

4 Discusses with specificity the characteristics of the work that reveal its Classical sources. The discussion is well developed and free of significant errors.

3 Discusses with specificity the characteristics of the work that reveal its Classical sources. The discussion is less well developed and may have minor errors.

2 Discusses characteristics of the work that reveal its Classical sources but with little specificity. The discussion is general and/or contains significant errors.

1 The discussion is weak or contains significant errors.

0 Makes an attempt, but the response is without merit because it restates the question or makes only incorrect or irrelevant statements.
descriptions: Makes an attempt, but the response is without merit because it restates the question or makes only incorrect or irrelevant statements.
The discussion is weak or contains significant errors.
Discusses characteristics of the work that reveal its Classical sources but with little specificity. The discussion is general and/or contains significant errors.
Discusses with specificity the characteristics of the work that reveal its Classical sources. The discussion is less well developed and may have minor errors.
Discusses with specificity the characteristics of the work that reveal its Classical sources. The discussion is well developed and free of significant errors.
